TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpUrlEncodedBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension
Public NotInheritable Class HttpUrlEncodedBinding Inherits ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: 表示添加到 XML Web services 中的 的扩展性元素。

span.span: Represents an extensibility element added to an within an XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类指定传入数据将采用格式"名称 = 值名称 = 值"，从 HTML 窗体，而不管是否已编码的值`Method`窗体的属性`POST`或`GET`。This class specifies that the incoming data will be in the format"name=value&name=value", encoded from an HTML form, regardless of whether the value of the `Method` attribute of the form is `POST` or `GET`. 请注意，此编码派生自的 HTML 一项功能，并不特定于类，尽管`HtmlForm`类支持它。Note that this encoding is derived from a feature of HTML and is not specific to the class, although the `HtmlForm` class does support it. 有关指定的 XML Web 服务协议的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
